Quote Tweet Kim Reynolds @KimReynoldsIA Let's worship God and take care of our neighbors. Let's strive to teach our children the same values, and let's give them a life that is better than our own.
2019-01-18T16:27:18.000Z: Let's worship God and take care of our neighbors. Let's strive to teach our children the same values, and let's give them a life that is better than our own.
2019-01-18T16:26:54.000Z: When it comes to the qualities that define our great State, let's not let the world change us. Let's change the world.
2019-01-18T16:24:26.000Z: But there are still Iowans who are struggling. They work hard but feel like they can't get ahead. They want something more, but believe that time has passed them by. For those Iowans, I'm here to tell you it's not too late. I'm living proof of that.
2019-01-18T16:23:41.000Z: We must do more than just prepare our kids for a career. We have to teach them to be moral, productive members of society. We must instill in them the Iowa values that our parents instilled in us.
2019-01-18T16:21:50.000Z: If we look up and to each other, we will see that great things are happening in this State. And if we put our energy into action instead of outrage, we will find that there are even greater days to come.
2019-01-18T16:20:49.000Z: My ask of all Iowans, as we go into the next four years, is that you devote less time to online political arguments and more time to each other. That you don't let a screen steal time from your family and friends, from your community or school.
2019-01-18T16:19:55.000Z: Too often, across the country, people are looking not to themselves but to government to solve their neighbors' problems. They are focused less on what they can do and more on what they believe someone else is doing wrong.
2019-01-18T16:19:17.000Z: Government didn't make Iowa the best state in the nation, and government can't keep it that way.
2019-01-18T16:18:35.000Z: Iowans work hard, but not so much for themselves. They're ambitious, but not at at the expense of others.
2019-01-18T16:17:31.000Z: I've been fortunate to travel to all 99 counties every year for eight years. ... I get to see Iowa as a whole, and when I do-when I take a step back, squint my eyes and focus-here's what I see: one, big small town.
2019-01-18T16:15:56.000Z: We worship God; we take care of our neighbors; and we strive to teach our children the same values and give them a life that is better than our own. It's that simple. And it's why Iowa is the best state in the nation.
2019-01-18T16:13:45.000Z: I cannot think of a better place to grow up. My life has been so blessed because of it!
